name: js-rest-login
description: * start from the up-to-date main branch (`git checkout main; git pull origin main`) * Create a feature branch named 'js-rest-login' (`git checkout -b js-rest-login`) * modify the files in this directory to have the require features * add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to main * Be sure to include the TA(s) and I as reviewers.   * Due by 11:59pm (PT) Sun Mar 21
